summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mavecode coding learning platform. Backend API is 100% functional with all 26 endpoints working correctly. Frontend is largely functional with minor UI overlay issue affecting chatbot interaction.

ui_bugs.issue: Chatbot button click intercepted by emergent badge overlay
ui_bugs.details: Button exists and is visible but click events are blocked by overlay element

design_issues.issue: Dark mode toggle may not be switching themes properly

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and stats
All navigation links working (Kursus, Live Class, Artikel, Harga, FAQ)
Courses page with search and filtering functionality
Articles page displays articles correctly
Pricing page shows subscription plans
FAQ page loads with accordion questions
Contact page with working form inputs
User registration and login pages functional
Admin login with correct credentials (Mavecode07/Mavecode07)
Admin dashboard and courses management accessible
Mentor section with Firza Ilmi image and info
Course categories navigation working
Footer with social links and contact info
Mobile responsive design with working menu
All 26 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
AI chatbot API responding correctly
User authentication flows working
Admin CRUD operations functional
Contact form submission working
Seed data generation working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix chatbot overlay issue - the emergent badge is intercepting click events on the chatbot button. Consider adjusting z-index or positioning to prevent interference.
